snippet: Glencore International, the world's biggest commodities-trading company, sweetened its offer for Xstrata in a last-minute bid to save the mega-merger.
abstract: Glencore International, the world's biggest commodities-trading company, sweetened its offer for Xstrata in a last-minute bid to save the mega-merger.

headline.main: Glencore's Bid to Buy Xstrata Is Increased at the 11th Hour
headline.print_headline: Bid to Buy Mining Firm Is Increased At 11th Hour
